detailHtml:
Why this 31-piece granite set is $59 for Black Friday

Full kitchen coverage: stockpots, fry pans, grill pan, silicone tools, and a bonus chef knife set with built-in sharpener. Multi-layer granite coating releases food fast, cleans in seconds, and works across gas, ceramic, and oven setups.

Granite non-stick

Low-oil cooking, stain-resistant, PFOA-free.

Full 31-piece kit

Stockpots 16–40 cm, grill, fry pans, utensils, knives.

Fast, even heat

Die-cast aluminum body, thick base, no hot spots.

Steam-vented lids

5 mm tempered glass with stainless rim for precision cooking.

Multi-hob ready

Gas, ceramic, hotplate; oven and microwave safe components.

Easy clean

Smooth curves, residue won’t stick—wipes clean in seconds.

Whole-kitchen coverage

From 16 cm sauce pot to 40 cm stockpot, plus grill and fry pans for every meal size.

Granite non-stick coating

Food slides off with minimal oil; stain-resistant surface stays clean.

31 pieces in one bundle

Stockpots, shallow pans, double grill pan, detachable-handle fry pan, and full utensil kit.

Rapid, even heating

Die-cast aluminum base distributes heat fast and prevents hot spots.

Utensils included

Silicone tools with wooden handles plus detachable handle fry pan for space-saving cooking.

Bonus chef knife set

Kitchen knife set with built-in sharpener ships free when you order during Black Friday.

What’s inside (31 pcs)

  • Stockpots: 16 cm (1.5 L), 20 cm (2.3 L), 24 cm (4.1 L), 28 cm (6.9 L), 32 cm (9.5 L), 36 cm (13 L), 40 cm (18 L)
  • Fry & shallow pans: 24 cm detachable-handle fry pan (1.6 L), 28 cm (3.9 L), 32 cm (5.8 L) shallow pans
  • 30 cm deep double grill pan for searing, roasting, and sandwiches
  • Utensils: silicone brush, silicone slotted turner (wood handle), silicone spatula, silicone turner, silicone spoon (wood handle), garlic press
  • Bonus: kitchen cooking chef knife set with built-in sharpener

Cook smarter, clean faster

  • Steam-ventilated glass lids with stainless rim for precise simmering
  • Compatible with gas, ceramic, hotplate; oven and microwave safe components
  • Curved interior walls prevent residue buildup; wipes clean with a soft sponge
  • Thick 6 mm bases resist warping and spread heat evenly
  • PFOA-free materials keep family cooking safer

guarantee.title: Cook on it for 30 days, or send it back
guarantee.description: Try every pot, pan, grill, and utensil for a month. If it doesn’t beat your current set, return it for a full refund.
bullets: Fast replacements if a lid or handle arrives damaged
Ships within 24 hours during Black Friday
guarantee.note: Return shipping label included if you’re not satisfied

comments.headline: Home cooks love the price and clean-up
comments.description: Live feedback from Black Friday buyers who replaced old pans and saved cleanup time.
comments.activity: 9 fresh 5-star reviews posted in the last 6 minutes
activityMessages: Leah just grabbed the $59 set for her first apartment
Marco ordered a second set as a gift
Priya confirmed the bonus knife set was included
Chris swapped his scratched pans for this granite set

reviews.name: Leah M. | First kitchen setup
reviews.content: All pots and utensils in one box. Non-stick is legit—I made eggs with almost no oil and wiped it clean.

reviews.name: Marco S. | Home cook
reviews.content: The double grill pan is my favorite for steaks and pressed sandwiches. Heat is even and cleans fast.

reviews.name: Priya K. | Busy parent
reviews.content: Great value for $59. Lids vent steam and the silicone tools don’t scratch the coating. Bonus knives arrived in the box.

reviews.name: Chris D. | Apartment chef
reviews.content: I needed multi-size pots for batch cooking—this set covers everything. Handles feel solid, coating hasn’t stained.

reviews.name: Amelia R. | Meal prepper
reviews.content: The curved interior makes scraping sauces super easy. Even heat and no hot spots so far.

reviews.name: Jason T. | Gift buyer
reviews.content: Bought one for my parents. They like that it’s PFOA-free and oven compatible.

faq.question: Q1. Which cooktops does it work on?
faq.answer: It works on gas, ceramic, hotplate, and is oven-safe. Selected pieces are microwave safe—avoid using metal lids in microwaves.

faq.question: Q2. Is the granite coating safe?
faq.answer: Yes. It’s PFOA-free and designed for low-oil cooking with easy release.

faq.question: Q3. What pieces are included?
faq.answer: Seven stockpot sizes, three shallow/fry pans, a deep double grill pan, full silicone utensil set, detachable handle, and a bonus chef knife set with sharpener.

faq.question: Q4. How do I clean it?
faq.answer: Hand wash with a soft sponge. The curved interior prevents residue; avoid metal utensils to protect the coating.
